tools.name: orchestrate_fulfillment
tools.description: Orchestrate multi-agent analysis to determine fulfillment capability for orders. JSON body: {timeframe?, order_ids?, constraints?}.

tools.name: create_action_plan
tools.description: Create comprehensive action plans for supply chain scenarios. JSON body: {scenario, priority?, constraints?}.

tools.name: synthesize_multi_agent_response
tools.description: Synthesize responses from multiple agents into a comprehensive answer. JSON body: {agent_responses, original_query, context?}.
